basics.name: Ronald Xie
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Accounting, Finance, and Management Information Systems at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2023.

education.area: Accounting, Finance, and Management Information Systems (expected Fall, 2023)

work.position: ICS 390: Computing Ethics, Assistant Teaching Assistant
highlights: Assisted one-on-one with students during weekly tutoring hours to help them navigate through the challenges in class and homework
Planed and instructed one week of an upper-division course on ethical theories, and one week of a lower-division course on the application of Microsoft Excel
Provided extraordinary service to customers by completing their orders efficiently and accurately while coordinating with colleagues
Handled customer complaints and busy hours with customer centricity and problem-solving skills
Coordinate a dozen of professional development events, including office tours, workshops, and professional interactions to help members develop on-demand soft skills and strengthen their network
Manage social media and post regularly to maintain student relations and build club cohesion
